sections.purpose: To describe the method for determining friability of tablets.
sections.scope: Applicable to evaluation of tablet dosage forms in the Pharmaceutics laboratory.
procedure: Clean and dry the friabilator drum.
Set the apparatus for the specified number of rotations.
Start the apparatus and allow it to run.
Remove tablets, dust them, and reweigh.
sections.precautions: Ensure tablets are free from moisture before testing.
